frontmatter.title: Getting started with Ansible
frontmatter.description: Ansible is a open source tool backed by red hat since 2015, that gives you the skill to control and configure multiple server from one single location. So, instead of having to go to each server and configure them, you can create automations with Ansible to do that for you. The benefits of Ansible are that...
